name: Alien Cat 5
description:
Alien Cat 5 is a flight simulator with a side view. The player's task is to take off, as well as land their spacecraft on the station. The game is challenging by the fact that before the landing platform is activated you need to collect all the coins on the playing field. In addition, the game has a fuel indicator if it runs out, the ship will crash down, be careful and do not forget to replenish fuel! Good luck!

Game features:
  • 30 levels with increasing difficulty
  • Old school gameplay
  • Pixel art graphics
